Articles.Content: All the vehicles built in the SPH including the stock ones have disappeared well to be precise there still in the folders they just don't appear when I try to load a plane I tried uninstalling my mods I tried reinstalling the game. Can anyone lend me a hand Devs, QA, Players?

If you've started a new career game then the above could happen, you can choose to have stock vessels displayed in career games in the settings.

Otherwise, you'll need to provide more information.
